# Handles events emitted from the UI generated by `data_extract_filter_ui`

Handles events emitted from the UI generated by `data_extract_filter_ui`

## Usage

``` r
data_extract_filter_srv(id, datasets, filter)
```

## Arguments

- id:

  (`character`) id string.

- datasets:

  (`named list`) a list of reactive `data.frame` type objects.

- filter:

  (`filter_spec`) the filter generated by a call to
  [`filter_spec()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.transform/reference/filter_spec.md).

## Value

`NULL`, invisibly.

## Note

This shiny module server updates the values of the `vals`
[`teal.widgets::optionalSelectInput()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.widgets/latest-tag/reference/optionalSelectInput.html)
widget. It's responsible for setting the initial values and the
subsequent updates to the `vals` widget based on the input of the `col`
widget.
